articles.content:
New Mongolian ambassador arrives 
    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- New Mongolian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK Janchivdorjyn Lombo arrived here on September 13.

articles.title: Congratulatory message to Belarussian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory message to Belarussian President
    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Yong Nam of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sept. 11 sent a congratulatory message to Alexandr Lukashenko upon his reelection as President of Belarus.
 The message expressed the conviction that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in the new century, too and wished the president success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of the people.

articles.title: Greetings to Nicaraguan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Nicaraguan President
    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sept. 12 sent a message of greetings to Nicaraguan President Arnoldo Aleman Racayo on the occasion of the 180th anniversary of its independence.
 In the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop, the message wished the President and people of Nicaragua greater success in the work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Nicaraguan foreign minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Nicaraguan foreign minister
    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Nicaraguan foreign minister Francisco Aguirre Sacasa on the occasion of the 180th anniversary of its independence.
 In the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on better terms, the message wished the Nicaraguan foreign minister greater success in the work.
